snippet: Tata’s bid is “undervalued” and “ill-timed,” Orient Express says.
abstract: Tata’s bid is “undervalued” and “ill-timed,” Orient Express says.
lead_paragraph: “Orient-Express Hotels formally rejected an unsolicited takeover bid by an arm of the Tata Group of India, criticizing it as undervalued and ill timed,” Michael J. De La Merced wrote in Dealbook.

headline.main: Orient Express Rejects Takeover Bid and Names New Chief
